CssProperty.name: system
CssProperty.description: Specifies which algorithm will be used to construct the counter’s representation based on the counter value

CssProperty.name: negative
CssProperty.description: Defines how to alter the representation when the counter value is negative

CssProperty.name: prefix
CssProperty.description: Specifies a symbol that is prepended to the marker representation

CssProperty.name: suffix
CssProperty.description: Specifies a symbol that is appended to the marker representation

CssProperty.name: range
CssProperty.description: Specifies which algorithm will be used to construct the counter’s representation based on the counter value

CssProperty.name: pad
CssProperty.description: Allows an author to specify a 'fixed-width' counter style, where representations shorter than the pad value are padded with a particular symbol

CssProperty.name: fallback
CssProperty.description: Specifies a fallback counter style to be used when the current counter style can’t create a representation for a given counter value

CssProperty.name: speak-as
CssProperty.description: Describes how to synthesize the spoken form of a counter formatted with the given counter style
